document_data.name: Copper Knobberknocker
document_data.mainbody: '''Copper Knobberknocker''' was a [[gnome]] tinkerer and devotee of [[Lathander]], who lived in [[Icewind Dale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite book/Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden|32}}{{Template:Cite book/Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden|121}}
document_data.Possessions: He wore a big fuzzy hooded coat that made him look like a bear cub.{{Template:Cite book/Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden|33}}
document_data.Relationships: For some time, Copper served as the assistant to the [[sage]] [[Macreadus]] at his isolated residence referred to as the [[Black Cabin]]. While the two friends were working on a powerful magical device called the ''[[Summer Star]]'', their lack of success with the project, combined with living conditions that were less than ideal, caused them to bicker all the time.
document_data.History:
Some time around the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, Copper and Macreadus got into a particularly bad argument and the gnome left the cabin for the [[Ten Towns]].
